bib.title: A network perspective on stratification of multi-label data
bib.author: Szyma{\'n}ski, Piotr and Kajdanowicz, Tomasz
bib.abstract: We present a new approach to stratifying multi-label data for classification purposes based on the iterative stratification approach proposed by Sechidis et. al. in an ECML PKDD 2011 paper. Our method extends the iterative approach to take into account second-order relationships between labels. Obtained results are evaluated using statistical properties of obtained strata as presented by Sechidis. We also propose new statistical measures relevant to second-order quality: label pairs distribution, the percentage of label pairs
bib.booktitle: First International Workshop on Learning with Imbalanced Domains: Theory and Applications
